meanings.definition: A larval stage of certain tapeworms, typically found in the body cavity of an intermediate host.
meanings.sent1: The procercoids were discovered in the body of the fish.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study procercoids to understand tapeworm development.
meanings.sent3: The procercoids threw a tiny party in the fish's belly.
meanings.sent4: The procercoids were like hidden gems waiting to be found.
meanings.sent5: The wriggling procercoids in the fish were a fascinating sight.

meanings.definition: The plural form of procercoid, referring to multiple larval tapeworm stages.
meanings.sent1: Many procercoids were observed in the microscope slide.
meanings.sent2: The jar contained various procercoids collected from different hosts.
meanings.sent3: The procercoids in the jar seemed to be having a meeting.
meanings.sent4: The procercoids were like tiny grains of sand in the sea of tapeworms.
meanings.sent5: The abundance of procercoids indicated a thriving tapeworm population.
